name: Ghost Ship CTF
description:
Capture The Flag!!! Grab the other team's flag and return it to your flag.

At long last, my 3 month project is completed :)

__If you get stuck__ or would like to read the "Making Of," you can find more info at the following link:

https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=46759

Featuring:

  • 3 Maps! 🗺
  • Collectable coins! 💰
  • Wild and crazy combat! ⚔️
  • Music and sound effects 🔈
  • Single player only :p 🤷🏻‍♂️
  • As always, your favorite PICO-8 HTML Player ammenities: full screen, joysticks, and more! 🤓
  • Not to mention, for PICO-8 owners, there a few terminal mods built into the game in addition to the built-in screen capture and SPLORE! 💾

Awesome sprites by Gustavo! https://gvituri.itch.io/
